QuestData.Title: Removing the Paper Trail
QuestData.Description: This box is filled with writings and diagrams that oddly resemble research into the nullification of magic.$b$bIt would be best to ruin these efforts by destroying any research found.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Boxes of Ogre Research at Mar'gok's Overwatch.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent job thinking on your feet. The less research these ogres do, the better!
